contributionDescription:
1)  Educator for OP contributors, Grantee, Users:

- Not only targeting users but also aiming to onboard more contributors.
- I dedicate 65% of my content to OP stack.
- Onboarding other chain users.

Cover:
- How to contribute to OP
- Consulting (how-to/procedure) about OP contribution
- Dapp knowledge
- Security
- Defi
- Tech insights
- Investment opportunities


2) "OP Grants the Series" - a continuous initiative:
âœ… Educated individuals about the projects that get OP grants.

âœ… Encouraged more people to build with OP.
âœ… Users know what's going on in OP ecosystem.


3) RetweetDAO - Discord Community 
For those interested in contributing to OP:
- Provides consultation
- Offers guidelines
- Kickstarts new contributors.
- Tools & resources.
